title: Wonderful 4bd 2ba Townhome near the BLVD!!
map_address: 715 W. Milling Street near Fig Street
posting_body: Our communities also provide virtual tours, or can take you on a live video tour through the community.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website for more information or call/email a member of our leasing team - We're here for you!
This is a 4 Bedroom, 2Ba Bath, approximately 1350 Sq.
Dishwasher, Wired for Cable, High Speed Internet, Oven, Refrigerator, Microwave, Garbage Disposal, Heating, Carpeting, Stove, A/C, Ceiling Fans, 2 Car covered carport.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply, income restrictions may apply.
